EmailTemplate.name: EMEA_Event_Open House & DTF_Istanbul_Q416.Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Confirmation: Pivotal Digital Transformation Forum
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://pivotal.io/event/digital-transformation-forum/istanbul]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for registering for the upcoming Digital Transformation Forum in Turkey. See event details below:
Date: 3 November 2016 {{my.Save the Date}} Time: 9h00 - 16h00 Location: The Ritz-Carlton, No:6, Harbiye, Süzer Plaza, 34367 Istanbul/Şişli/İstanbul, Turkey
We look forward to meeting you soon!
The Pivotal Team
Questions? Please contact Phil Reay at preay@pivotal.io <[[mailto:preay@pivotal.io]]>.
